tier.item: [Gujarati] a. te-thii huM anumaan karuM chuM [ke maarii buddhi mand hashe]
this-from I. inference do-1s be-pres-1s that my intellect sluggish be-fut-3s
From this I make the inference that my intellect must have been sluggish'. (Masica 2000: 136

20) [Gujarati] . ramaa [raaj kaale aawshe ne/ke/kharo ] em puche che
Ram Raj tomorrow come-fut. not/Q/correct such ask be-pres
`Ram is inquiring [whether Raj will come tomorrow] (P.J. Mistry p.c.)
